input_text:
Job Title: Janitor III (DGD)

Location: Norco, LA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

Position Responsibilities:

Assist keeping site clean, trash pickup, sweeping, mopping floors and dustingResponds to emergency spills and calls as needed‎-‎Work order based and or phone calls‎.Services All Conference Rooms‎Rearrange rooms‎, ‎clean counters and empty trash receptaclesAssists with Conference Center set up as needed ‎Follows Event order to set up furniture per requestsServices Restrooms - Sanitizes all surface areas. Replenishes toiletry‎/‎paper products.Reports building maintenance issues and malfunctions. Reports equipment malfunction to supervisor. Supports and helps building occupants with cleaning or maintenance issues and follows up until claims‎/‎concerns are resolved.‎Follows direction from supervisorLift up to 50 lbs.Sanitizes all points of contact in Common Areas‎- ‎Entrances‎, ‎Walkways and Corridors‎, ‎Glass Doors and Door Hand Plates‎, ‎Staircases Railings‎, ‎etc.Job requires working in heat and wearing steel toe boots


Essential Skills, Knowledge, and Abilities: 

Must have good aptitude and manual dexterityAbility to work with others – team playerEffective communication skills with co-workers and supervisorsCommitment to Zachry values and safety rules and regulations Valid driver’s license requiredMust have reliable transportationMeet all physical demands and pre-employment conditionsRequired to adhere to all safety rules and regulationsAccess to the job site requires meeting pre-set criteria of a criminal background check


Valued but not required skills, knowledge, and abilities:

Former Zachry employee

Physical demands and work environment:

Physical demands: Employee will be required to adhere to substantial amounts of standing, walking, bending, squatting, and lifting and moving up to 50 lbs. Will talk and hear to communicate. Will use arms and hands to signal, grab, hold, turn, push, and pull objects, materials, controls, and tools. Give full attention to what other people are saying, taking time to understand directions. May be required to lift, carry, and move objects safely, Will occasionally work at heights, climb ladders and stairways, and work off of platforms. Will use vision abilities to focus, see short and long distances, colors, depth perception and peripheral vision. Will be required to wear personal protective equipment (PPE) including but not limited to hard hat, safety glasses/goggles, ear plugs/muffs, masks/respirators, safety vests, gloves, and steel-toe boots.Work environment: Will work in all weather conditions ranging from warm/hot – cool/cold, and occasional rain. Will work at different elevations with Noise levels being moderate to high. Job site will contain light to heavy equipment vehicles, small to large equipment, materials, communication equipment and tools. People standing, walking, sitting, signaling, and talking. Bells, whistles, and alarms.


ZACHRY is dedicated in providing a Safe and Drug Free work environment; and is an Equal Opportunity Employer

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Janitor III (DGD)
output_json.summary: Full-time position requiring cleaning duties and emergency response.
job_responsibilities: Assist in keeping the site clean
Respond to emergency spills and calls
Rearrange rooms, clean counters, and empty trash receptacles
Follow event orders to set up furniture
Report building maintenance issues and malfunctions
Support and help building occupants with cleaning or maintenance issues
Adhere to safety rules and regulations
output_json.physical_requirements: Substantial amounts of standing, walking, bending, squatting, and lifting up to 50 lbs. Talk and hear to communicate. Use arms and hands to signal, grab, hold, turn, push, and pull objects, materials, controls, and tools. Focus on directions. Lift, carry, and move objects safely. Work at heights, climb ladders and stairways, and work off platforms. Wear personal protective equipment (PPE) including hard hat, safety glasses/goggles, ear plugs/muffs, masks/respirators, safety vests, gloves, and steel-toe boots.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: ZACHRY is dedicated in providing a Safe and Drug Free work environment; and is an Equal Opportunity Employer
